# Fragments

## Content of fragmnet

### Example

```yaml
---
minor_changes:
  - ovirt_disk - Add backup (https://github.com/oVirt/ovirt-ansible-collection/pull/57).

```

### Types

- major_changes
- minor_changes
- bugfixes
- breaking_changes
- deprecated_features
- removed_features
- security_fixes

## Commands

`antsibull-changelog lint`

`antsibull-changelog release`
